verses.text_en_pickthall: When Allah´s succour and the triumph cometh

verses.text_ar: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.text_en_pickthall: And thou seest mankind entering the religion of Allah in troops,

verses.text_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then hymn the praises of thy Lord, and seek forgiveness of Him. Lo! He is ever ready to show mercy.
